name: chestnut
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] US plural also chestnut (UK sweet chestnut) a large tree with leaves divided into five parts and large, round nuts: a 200-year-old chestnut tree forests full of oak and chestnut Compare
horse chestnut
tiler84/ iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a large, brown nut that grows on a sweet chestnut tree, often cooked and eaten hot: A man in the street was selling bags of roast chestnuts.
Laurent Lhot/ Biosphoto/GettyImages
[ C ] a reddish-brown horse
virgonira/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ U ] a reddish-brown colour
Georgette Douwma/Stone/GettyImages

a large, shiny, red-brown nut, or the tree on which the nuts grow
Chestnut is also a deep red-brown color.
